name: JUNK: A Rock Opera (Original Cast Recording - LIVE in concert!)
description: 1 Compact Disc in bio-friendly, handmade packaging. 26 tracks. 76:56 run-time. Music and Lyrics by Brainpool, Deceloped for the Stage by Shakina Nayfack with additional Choreography by Ramie Becker, Musical Arrangements by Zachary Provost, Vocal Arrangements by DeReau K. Farrar, Produced, Recorded and Mixed by Ian Charbonneau, Executive Producers: EpicMegaPro and KamranV, Artwork by Amber Schields Original Workshop Cast ANNA — Natalya Oliver MAX — Daniel Guzman MARTINA — Niketa Calame HANNES — Kam Talbert ERNIE — Michael Edwin Stuart KIOKO — Aldo J. Puccini ENSEMBLE — Cindy Burnett, Michele Cavallero, Kathleen Chen, Jessica Coffman, Jonathan Corps, Booter Griffin, Kien Shimabukuro, Lindsay Stakoe KEYBOARDS/BAND-LEADER — Zachary Provst KEYBOARDS — Kevin Teasley GUITAR — Andrew Doolittle BASS — Daniel Pearson DRUMS — Steve Krugman BRAINPOOL is David Birde, Jens Jansson and Christoffer Lundquist. [If you prefer a digital download please download here from our friends at Amazon.]
